main.bot_arg.coffee: drink coffee if stamina is low during fish fight
main.bot_arg.alcohol: drink alcohol before keeping the fish
main.bot_arg.refill: consume tea and carrot if hunger or comfort is low
main.bot_arg.harvest: harvest baits before casting the rod
main.bot_arg.lure: change current lure with a random favorite one, mode: spin
main.bot_arg.mouse: move mouse randomly before casting the rod
main.bot_arg.pause: pause the script before casting the rod occasionally
main.bot_arg.random_cast: do a redundant rod cast randomly
main.bot_arg.lift: lift the tackle constantly during a fish fight
main.bot_arg.electro: enable electric mode for Electro Raptor series reel
main.bot_arg.gear_ratio: switch the gear ratio or mode after the retrieval timed out
main.bot_arg.bite: save a screenshot in screenshots/ when a fish bite
main.bot_arg.screenshot: save a screenshot in screenshots/ after you caught a fish
main.bot_arg.email: send email noticication after the script stop
main.bot_arg.miaotixing: send miaotixing notification after the script stop
main.bot_arg.discord: send Discord notification after the script stop
main.bot_arg.telegram: send Telegram notification after the script stop
main.bot_arg.shutdown: shutdown computer after the script stop
main.bot_arg.signout: sign out instead of closing the game
main.bot_arg.broken_lure: replace broken lures with favorite ones
main.bot_arg.dry_mix: enable dry mix refill, mode: bottom
main.bot_arg.no_animation:
disable waiting for trophy and gift animations, gift
change 'Catch screen style' to 'Simple' in game settings to use this flag
main.help.pid: specify the id of the profile to use
main.help.pname: specify the name of the profile to use
main.help.fishes_in_keepnet: specify the number of fishes in your keepnet, (default: %(default)s)
main.help.trolling:
enable trolling mode and specify the direction
(default: %(default)s, no argument: %(const)s)
main.help.rainbow:
enable rainbow line mode and specify the meter to lift the rod
(default: %(default)s, no argument: %(const)s)
main.help.boat_ticket:
enable boat ticket renewal and specify the duration
(default: %(default)s, no argument: %(const)s)
main.help.discard: discard all the crafted items (for groundbaits)
main.help.craft_limit: specify the number of items to craft, (default: %(default)s)
main.help.shift: Hold down the Shift key while moving
main.help.refill: refill hunger and comfort by consuming tea and carrot
main.prompt.enter_fid: Enter feature id to use, h to see help message, q to quit.
main.prompt.enter_launch_options: Enter launch options, Enter to skip, h to see help message, q to quit.
main.prompt.language: What's your game language? [(1) en (2) ru (3) q (quit)]
main.prompt.click_lock: Is Windows Mouse ClickLock enabled? [(1) yes (2) no (3) q (quit)]
main.incompatible_config:
Incompatible config version, some settings has been removed or deprecated
You can delete it to allow the bot to create a new one
Alternatively, see the CHANGELOG to modify config.yaml
app.press_to_reload: Press {pause_key} to reload config and restart.
app.hint.launch_options_ignored: Any modifications made to LAUNCH_OPTIONS will be ignored.
app.error.smtp_auth:
Invalid email address or app password
Check BOT.NOTIFICATION.EMAIL
Check BOT.NOTIFICATION.PASSWORD
For Gmail users, please refer to: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833
app.error.smtp_timeout: Invalid BOT.NOTIFICATION.SMTP_SERVER or connection timed out
app.error.discord_webhook:
BOT.NOTIFICATION.DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL is not set
To make a webhook, please refer to https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/228383668-Intro-to-Webhooks
app.prompt.enter_pid: Enter profile id to use, q to quit.
app.error.invalid_pid: Invalid profile id, please try again.
app.error.invalid_launch_options:
Invalid launch options: '{options}'
These arguments are used for config override: '{opts}'
app.window_mode_detected: Window mode detected. Don't move the game window
app.supported_window_size: Supported window size. Don't change the game window size
app.error.mode_unsupported_size: Fishing mode '{mode}' doesn't support window size '{size}'
app.warning.unsupported_window_size:
Unsupported window size '{size}'
Supported window size: '2560x1440', '1920x1080' or '1600x900'
Will search the image on the screen instead of the game window
app.error.features_disabled:
Snag detection will be disabled
Spooling detection will be disabled
Auto friction brake will be disabled
app.info.favorites_reminder: Some features require you to add the item to your favorites, make sure you have done so
app.warning.miaotixing_no_image: Miaotixing doesn't support image message, no screenshot will be sent
app.warning.default_retrieval: Default retrieval detection mode detected, fully spool your reel
app.craft.warning_ban: This might get you banned, use at your own risk
app.craft.warning_macros: Use Razor or Logitech macros instead
app.craft.make_not_found: Make button not found, please set the interface scale to 1x or move your mouse around
app.calculate.commands:
Commands:
r: Restart
s: Skip a part
S: Skip the remaining parts
p: Use previous value for a part
P: Use previous value for the remaing parts
q: Quit
app.calculate.hint: Press V and click the gear icon to view the parts.
app.fb.press_to_reset_quit: Press {reset_key} to reset friction brake, {quit_key} to quit.
app.fb.window_mode_detected: Window mode detected. don't move the game window
app.fb.supported_window_size: Supported window size. Don't change the game window size
app.fb.error.window_mode: Window mode must be "Borderless windowed" or "Window mode"
player.spawning_process: Spawing new process, do not quit the script
player.control_panel_detected: Control panel detected, back to the game automatically
player.groundbait_not_used: Groundbait is not used up yet
player.line_at_end: Fishing line is at its end
player.scrollbar_not_found: Scroll bar not found, changing lures for normal rig
player.scrollbar_found: Scroll bar found, changing lures for dropshot rig
player.clip_not_set: Clip is not set, fall back to camera mode
notification.miaotixing.error:
Miaotixing notification with error code: {code}
Description: {msg}
window.failed_to_locate: Failed to locate the game window, please open the game and try again
tackle.changing_gear: Changing gear ratio / electro assist mode
